options.content:
# 🕵️ Distributed Tracing with Tempo

This dashboard provides quick access to trace exploration and analysis. Click the buttons below to jump to specific trace queries in Tempo.

**Tip:** Use TraceQL queries to filter traces by service, duration, HTTP method, and more!

## 🔍 Common Trace Queries

**API Service Traces:**
```traceql
{ .service.name = "todo-list-xtreme-api" }
```

**Frontend Service Traces:**
```traceql
{ .service.name = "todo-list-xtreme-frontend" }
```

**Slow Requests:**
```traceql
{ duration > 100ms }
```

## 🚨 Error Analysis

**Error Traces:**
```traceql
{ .status = error }
```

**HTTP Errors:**
```traceql
{ .http.status_code >= 400 }
```

**Server Errors:**
```traceql
{ .http.status_code >= 500 }
```

## 🎯 Business Logic

**DELETE Operations:**
```traceql
{ .http.method = "DELETE" }
```

**POST Operations:**
```traceql
{ .http.method = "POST" }
```

**Todo Operations:**
```traceql
{ name =~ ".*todo.*" }
```

## 🚀 Quick Access Links

### Explore Traces by Service
- [API Service Traces](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.service.name%20%3D%20%5C%22todo-list-xtreme-api%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - All traces from the FastAPI backend
- [Frontend Service Traces](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.service.name%20%3D%20%5C%22todo-list-xtreme-frontend%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - All traces from the React frontend

### Performance Analysis
- [Slow Requests (>100ms)](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20duration%20%3E%20100ms%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Find performance bottlenecks
- [API Slow Requests](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.service.name%20%3D%20%5C%22todo-list-xtreme-api%5C%22%20%26%26%20duration%20%3E%2050ms%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Slow API operations

### HTTP Methods
- [GET Requests](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.method%20%3D%20%5C%22GET%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Read operations
- [POST Requests](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.method%20%3D%20%5C%22POST%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Create operations
- [DELETE Requests](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.method%20%3D%20%5C%22DELETE%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Delete operations
- [PUT Requests](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.method%20%3D%20%5C%22PUT%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Update operations

### Error Analysis
- [Error Traces](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.status%20%3D%20error%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - All error traces
- [HTTP 4xx Errors](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.status_code%20%3E%3D%20400%20%26%26%20.http.status_code%20%3C%20500%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Client errors
- [HTTP 5xx Errors](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20.http.status_code%20%3E%3D%20500%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Server errors

### Business Operations
- [Todo Operations](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20name%20%3D~%20%5C%22.*todo.*%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - All todo-related traces
- [Authentication Operations](http://localhost:3001/explore?left=%7B%22datasource%22:%22tempo%22,%22queries%22:%5B%7B%22query%22:%22%7B%20name%20%3D~%20%5C%22.*auth.*%5C%22%20%7D%22,%22queryType%22:%22%22%7D%5D%7D) - Auth-related traces

---

**💡 Pro Tips:**
- Combine filters: `{ .service.name = "todo-list-xtreme-api" && .http.method = "DELETE" && duration > 50ms }`
- Use regex patterns: `{ name =~ ".*pattern.*" }`
- Filter by time range using the time picker in Grafana
- Click on trace IDs to see detailed span information
